title: Vertex AI - 跟蹤類
abstract:
# Vertex AI - 跟蹤類
Python 版 Vertex AI SDK 包含可幫助您監控可視化效果、測量結果和跟蹤記錄的類。這些類可以分爲三類：
- 使用元數據跟蹤機器學習 (ML) 工作流中的資源的類
- 用於 Vertex AI Experiments 的類
- 用於 Vertex AI TensorBoard 的類
以下主題簡要介紹了用於在 Python 版 Vertex AI SDK 中跟蹤和監控機器學習工作流的類。
content:
## 元數據類
您可以使用 Python 版 Vertex AI SDK 創建 Vertex ML Metadata 元數據，以幫助您跟蹤和分析機器學習工作流中的元數據。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [Vertex ML Metadata 簡介](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/ml-metadata/introduction?hl=zh-cn) 。
### Artifact
[Artifact](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Artifact?hl=zh-cn) 類表示 Vertex AI 工件中的元數據。工件是機器學習工作流生成的離散實體或數據塊。例如，工件可以是 [數據集](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/datasets/overview?hl=zh-cn) 、 [模型](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/training-overview?hl=zh-cn) 或 [輸入文件](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/video-data/classification/prepare-data?hl=zh-cn#input-files) 。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [跟蹤執行和工件](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/experiments/track-executions-artifacts?hl=zh-cn) 。
創建 [Artifact](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Artifact?hl=zh-cn) 資源時，您需要指定其架構。每種類型的工件都具有自己專有的架構。例如， `system.Dataset` 架構表示數據集， `system.Metrics` 架構表示評估指標。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [如何使用系統架構](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/ml-metadata/system-schemas?hl=zh-cn#how_to_use_system_schemas) 。
以下示例代碼展示瞭如何創建表示模型的 [Artifact](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Artifact?hl=zh-cn) 資源：
```
model_artifact = aiplatform.Artifact.create(        schema_title="system.Model",        display_name=PREPROCESSED_DATASET_NAME,        uri=PREPROCESSED_DATASET_URI,
```
### Execution
[Execution](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Execution?hl=zh-cn) 類表示 Vertex AI 執行中的元數據。執行是機器學習工作流中的一個步驟。例如，執行可以是數據處理、訓練或模型評估。執行可能會使用工件（例如數據集），也可能會生成工件（例如模型）。
使用 [aiplatform.start_execution](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform?hl=zh-cn#google_cloud_aiplatform_start_execution) 創建 [Execution](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Execution?hl=zh-cn) 資源。創建 [Execution](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Execution?hl=zh-cn) 資源後，使用相同的 [aiplatform.start_execution](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform?hl=zh-cn#google_cloud_aiplatform_start_execution) 方法並將 `resume` 參數設置爲 `True` ，以恢復執行。
以下示例代碼展示瞭如何創建 [Execution](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Execution?hl=zh-cn) 資源：
```
with aiplatform.start_execution(schema_title='system.ContainerExecution',                                display_name='trainer') as execution:    execution.assign_input_artifacts([my_artifact])    model = aiplatform.Artifact.create(uri='gs://my-uri', schema_title='system.Model')    execution.assign_output_artifacts([model])
```
## Vertex AI Experiments 類
您可以使用 Python 版 Vertex AI SDK 創建並運行 Vertex AI Experiments 實驗。可通過 Vertex AI Experiments 實驗跟蹤記錄的指標和參數，以幫助您分析和優化機器學習工作流。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [Vertex AI Experiments 簡介](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/experiments/intro-vertex-ai-experiments?hl=zh-cn) 。
如需詳細瞭解如何使用 [Experiment](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Experiment?hl=zh-cn) 和 [ExperimentRun](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.ExperimentRun?hl=zh-cn) 類，請嘗試學習以下教程之一：
- [構建 Vertex AI Experiments 實驗沿襲以進行自定義訓練](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/experiments/build_model_experimentation_lineage_with_prebuild_code.ipynb) 
- [跟蹤本地訓練的模型的參數和指標](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/experiments/comparing_local_trained_models.ipynb) 
- [通過 Vertex AI Experiments 實驗比較各流水線運行](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/experiments/comparing_pipeline_runs.ipynb) 
- [Vertex AI Experiments 使用入門](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/experiments/get_started_with_vertex_experiments.ipynb) 
### Experiment
[Experiment](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Experiment?hl=zh-cn) 類表示 Vertex AI 中的實驗。使用各種不同的配置（例如各種輸入工件和超參數）通過實驗分析其 [實驗運行作業](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/experiments/create-manage-exp-run?hl=zh-cn) 和 [流水線運行作業](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/pipelines/run-pipeline?hl=zh-cn) 。
您可以通過以下兩種方式創建 [Experiment](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Experiment?hl=zh-cn) 資源：
- 創建 [Experiment](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Experiment?hl=zh-cn) 的首選方法是在調用 [aiplatform.init](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform?hl=zh-cn#google_cloud_aiplatform_init) 時將實驗的名稱指定爲一個參數：```
# In a real world scenario it's likely you would specify more parameters# when you call aiplatform.init. This sample shows only how to use the# parameter used to create an Experiment.# Specify a name for the experimentEXPERIMENT_NAME = "your-experiment-name"# Create the experimentaiplatform.init(experiment=EXPERIMENT_NAME)
```
- 您也可以通過調用 [aiplatform.Experiment.create](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Experiment?hl=zh-cn#google_cloud_aiplatform_Experiment_create) 來創建 [Experiment](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Experiment?hl=zh-cn) 。 [aiplatform.Experiment.create](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Experiment?hl=zh-cn#google_cloud_aiplatform_Experiment_create) 會創建 [Experiment](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Experiment?hl=zh-cn) 資源，但不會將其設置爲全局環境。因此，您無法使用 [aiplatform.start_run](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform?hl=zh-cn#google_cloud_aiplatform_start_run) 運行實驗。以下示例代碼展示瞭如何使用 [aiplatform.Experiment.create](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Experiment?hl=zh-cn#google_cloud_aiplatform_Experiment_create) 創建實驗，然後運行該實驗：```
# Specify a name for the experimentEXPERIMENT_NAME = "your-experiment-name"EXPERIMENT_RUN_NAME = "your-run"# Create the experimentexperiment = aiplatform.Experiment.create(experiment_name=EXPERIMENT_NAME)experiment_run = aiplatform.ExperimentRun.create(EXPERIMENT_RUN_NAME, experiment=EXPERIMENT_NAME)
```
### ExperimentRun
[ExperimentRun](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.ExperimentRun?hl=zh-cn) 類表示實驗的運行作業。
以下示例代碼展示瞭如何創建和啓動實驗運行作業，然後用其獲取有關實驗的信息。如需刪除實驗運行作業，請引用 [ExperimentRun](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.ExperimentRun?hl=zh-cn) 實例並對其調用 [delete](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.ExperimentRun?hl=zh-cn#google_cloud_aiplatform_ExperimentRun_delete) 方法。
```
# Specify your project name, location, experiment name, and run namePROJECT_NAME = "my-project"LOCATION = "us-central1"EXPERIMENT_NAME = "experiment-1"RUN_NAME = "run-1"# Create the experiment to runaiplatform.init(experiment_name=EXPERIMENT_NAME,                project=PROJECT_NAME,                location=LOCATION)# Create and run an ExperimentRun resource. Next, you can use it to get# information about your experiment. For example, you can log parameters and# metrics with specified key-value pairs.with aiplatform.start_run(RUN_NAME):     aiplatform.log_params({'learning_rate': 0.1, 'dropout_rate': 0.2})     aiplatform.log_metrics({'accuracy': 0.9, 'recall': 0.8})# Get a reference to the ExperimentRun resource, get the parameters logged to# the run, get the summary metrics logged to the run, then delete it.with aiplatform.start_run(RUN_NAME, resume=True) as run:     run.get_params()     run.get_metrics()     run.delete()
```
## Vertex AI TensorBoard 類
Python 版 Vertex AI SDK 包含可對開源 [Vertex AI TensorBoard](https://www.tensorflow.org/tensorboard/get_started?hl=zh-cn) 代管版本使用的類。Vertex AI TensorBoard 是一種用於在機器學習工作流執行期間監控測量結果和可視化效果的工具。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [Vertex AI TensorBoard 使用入門](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/experiments/tensorboard-introduction?hl=zh-cn) 。
如需詳細瞭解如何搭配 Vertex AI TensorBoard 使用 Python 版 Vertex AI SDK，請嘗試學習以下筆記本教程之一：
- [使用 Vertex AI TensorBoard Profiler 分析模型訓練性能](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/custom/custom_training_tensorboard_profiler.ipynb) 
- [使用自定義容器進行 Vertex AI TensorBoard 自定義訓練](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/tensorboard/tensorboard_custom_training_with_custom_container.ipynb) 。
- [使用預構建容器進行 Vertex AI TensorBoard 自定義訓練](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/tensorboard/tensorboard_custom_training_with_prebuilt_container.ipynb) 
- [使用 HParams 信息中心進行 Vertex AI TensorBoard 超參數調節](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/tensorboard/tensorboard_hyperparameter_tuning_with_hparams.ipynb) 
- [使用 Vertex AI TensorBoard Profiler 來分析模型訓練性能](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/tensorboard/tensorboard_profiler_custom_training.ipynb) 
- [在通過預構建容器進行的自定義訓練中使用 Vertex AI TensorBoard Profiler 來分析模型訓練性能](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/tensorboard/tensorboard_profiler_custom_training_with_prebuilt_container.ipynb) 
- [在通過預構建容器進行的自定義訓練中使用 Vertex AI TensorBoard Profiler 來分析模型訓練性能](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/official/tensorboard/tensorboard_profiler_custom_training_with_prebuilt_container.ipynb) 
### Tensorboard
[Tensorboard](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Tensorboard?hl=zh-cn) 類表示用來存儲 Vertex AI TensorBoard 實驗的代管式資源。您需要先創建一個 [Tensorboard](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Tensorboard?hl=zh-cn) 實例，然後才能直觀呈現實驗。您可以在一個 Google Cloud 項目中創建多個 [Tensorboard](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Tensorboard?hl=zh-cn) 實例。
以下示例代碼展示瞭如何創建 [Tensorboard](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.Tensorboard?hl=zh-cn) 實例：
```
# Specify your project name, location, and the name of your TensorboardPROJECT_NAME = "my-project"LOCATION = "us-central1"TENSORBOARD_NAME = "my-tensorboard"aiplatform.init(project=PROJECT_NAME, location=LOCATION)tensorboard = aiplatform.Tensorboard.create(    display_name=TENSORBOARD_NAME,    project=PROJECT_NAME,    location=LOCATION,)
```
### TensorboardExperiment
[TensorboardExperiment](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.TensorboardExperiment?hl=zh-cn) 表示一組 [TensorboardRun](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.TensorboardRun?hl=zh-cn) 對象。 [TensorboardRun](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.TensorboardRun?hl=zh-cn) 實例表示在 TensorBoard 中運行的訓練作業的結果。
### TensorboardRun
[TensorboardRun](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.TensorboardRun?hl=zh-cn) 類的實例會映射到在 TensorBoard 中運行的訓練作業，並會指定一組超參數以及模型定義、數據集等信息。
### TensorboardTimeSeries
[TensorboardTimeSeries](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/google.cloud.aiplatform.TensorboardTimeSeries?hl=zh-cn) 類表示在訓練運行作業中生成的時序。
## 後續步驟
- 瞭解 [Vertex AI SDK](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/python-sdk/use-vertex-ai-python-sdk?hl=zh-cn) 。
